string.name: name
string.value: A New Skill for Wind Archer
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101005##k...

#p1101005# told me there is indeed a new skill, but it's dangerous for me to learn the skill right now based on my level. He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #b#t4032121##k... \n\n#i4032122# #t4032122# #b#c4032122# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032122#. #p1101005# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called the Hurricane.

...What is it? A new skill...? #p1101002# must have spilled this secret. I am not surprised he did that. Yes, there is a new skill out there, but I believe your level is too low for that. It's just too dangerous.
#b#L0#I still want to learn the skill.#l
#L1#Since you say it's too dangerous......#l
#k

...If you really want the skill, then there is a way. You will have to show me that you are capable of handling this new skill. It will not be easy, and it may even be life-threatening. Do, do you still want to do it?
...Sometimes, a risky proposition like this can do you a huge favor.
The test is set up at #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#. Take the test, and bring back #b#t4032122##k with you. If you can do that, then I will teach you the new skill.
...Yes, it was I who rejected it, but I have to say I am quite disappointed. I did not want to see you turn into a coward like that.
You managed to successfully bring back #t4032122#. I knew you wouldn't let me down. Okay, now that you have proven me that you are worthy of this new skill, here it is.
A news kill for the Wind Archers, #bHurricane#k. Please use this only when necessary.
I guess you were unable to acquire #b#t4032122##k. Head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, take the test, and bring back #t4032122# with you.
